Home » News » Buhari approves executive management for River Basin Devt Authorities Buhari approves executive management for River Basin Devt Authorities On 9:41 pm In News by Tony Comments 
President Muhammadu Buhari has approved the reconstitution of the Executive Management of River Basin Development Authorities under the Federal Ministry of Water Resources. 
In a statement made available to newsmen by Garba Shehu, SSA to Mr. President on (Media & Publicity), it said the appointments are with immediate effect. Buhari

Obasi — Executive Director, Agricultural Services Dr. Benjamin Aneke — Executive Director, Planning and Design Mrs. Ngozi C. Uche –Executive Director, Finance and Administration
